title: The Artifact Schema
description: This is an Artifact which consists of four sections

Testing_inner_oneOf.description: This is the desc for testing inner oneOf

standard_details.description: Extra information related to the standard and the compliance

oneOf.description: Testing the desc of items in oneOf

General_Description.description: General information to one of the Company's Decision Strategy Makers, usually the one responsible for it’s vision

name.description: This field should contain the name of the Artifact

description.description: This field should contain a short description of the Artifact

tags.description: Each element of this array should contain some keywords that describe the functionality of every nested Artifact

nested_artifact_id.description: The id of the nested Artifact

Licensing.description: Information about the licensing of the service

nested_artifact_id.description: The id of the nested Artifact

Compliance.description: All the cases where the product complies and conforms to a policy or law

standard_details.description: Extra information related to the standard and the compliance

Interfaces.description: Detailed information regarding the product’s Input and Output data.

Update_Strategy.description: OS’s upgrade plan for   traditional updates, security updates and backports

Pricing_Models.description: Pricing models, for a company’s executive who has primary responsibility for managing it’s finances and all the issues of financial nature

pricing_function.description: Pricing function which could include several pricing factors based on the inividual components

Tech_Components.description: Refers to the company’s executive whose main, primary focus is on scientific and technological issues within the organization

module_name.description: module_name as this has been defined in the tech_overview.modules field

sequence.description: A specific sequence of modules, identified by their module_names as these have been defined in the tech_overview.modules field

cookbooks.description: The URI to the cookbook script file for each one module

module_name.description: module_name as this has been defined in the tech_overview.modules field

junit_tests.description: A junit test for each module

module_name.description: module_name as this has been defined in the Tech_Components.technological_details.tech_overview.modules field

input_output.description: Example data for the input/output of each one interface as these have been defined in the General_Description.Interfaces field

interface_name.description: interface_name as this has been defined in the General_Description.Interfaces field

tuples.description: Includes all the information needed for the developers to understand which Tuples are contained in each cookbook

tuple.description: tuple name and information regarding it

api.description: Additional metadata for each one interface as these have been defined in the General_Description.Interfaces field

interface_name.description: interface_name as this has been defined in the General_Description.Interfaces field

path.description: A relative path to an individual endpoint, beginning with a slash
